A

AuthService - Class in org.neocoder.services.auth
AuthService is a class that provides methods for password management, including creating password hashes and comparing passwords.

comparePassword(String, String) - Static method in class org.neocoder.services.auth.AuthService
Compares a plain-text password with a previously hashed password.
